pages.privacy-policy: Privacy Policy - WashWizardry - Protecting Your Privacy WashWizardry washwizardry@gmail.com HOME ABOUT US Services Contact CONTACT US Privacy Policy WashWizardry respects the privacy of its users and is committed to protecting your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and protect your personal information when you visit our website. Information We Collect We may collect the following information from you: Personal information you provide, such as your name, email address, and contact information when you sign up for our newsletter or contact us. Information collected automatically through your use of the website, such as your IP address, browser type, and browsing history. How We Use Your Information We may use your information for the following purposes: To provide you with the information and services you request. To send you newsletters and promotional emails. To improve the content and functionality of our website. Disclosure of Your Information We will not share your personal information with third parties without your consent, except in the following cases: To comply with legal or regulatory requirements. To protect the security or integrity of our website. Data Security We take reasonable steps to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, or destruction. However, no website is completely secure, and we cannot guarantee the security of your information. Your Choices You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information. You can also opt out of receiving marketing communications from us. Changes to this Privacy Policy We may change this Privacy Policy at any time. We will post any changes on this page. The WashWizardry website uses cookies to ensure you get the best experience on our site. Accept or Decline. pages.terms-conditions: Terms and Conditions - WashWizardry - Guidelines for Service Usage WashWizardry washwizardry@gmail.com HOME ABOUT US Services Contact CONTACT US Terms and Conditions By using the services provided by WashWizardry, you agree to be bound by the following terms and conditions: All laundry items must be properly labeled with the customer's name and contact information. WashWizardry is not liable for any damages or loss of items that occur during the laundry process. Customers are responsible for checking their laundry items for any valuables or personal belongings before submitting them for cleaning. Payment for laundry services is due upon delivery or pickup, unless otherwise agreed upon. WashWizardry reserves the right to refuse service to anyone who violates these terms and conditions or engages in fraudulent activity. Please read these terms and conditions carefully before using our services. If you do not agree with any part of these terms, please do not use our services.
